Class AttributeTransformer

java.lang.Object
  com.putable.tilenet.Util.AttributeTransformer

public class AttributeTransformer
extends java.lang.Object

Serves to translate strings into and out of proper TileNet protocol.

stringToAttribute

public static java.lang.String stringToAttribute(java.lang.String unformatted)
Converts all instances of '&', '<', and '"' to proper TileNet form so that they may be transmitted as attribute values.

Parameters:
unformatted - - the string requiring a transformation.
Returns:
The 'transformed' string

hex2Image

public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage hex2Image(java.lang.String hex)
Converts a hex string representing a byte[] representing an image into a BufferedImage. Assumes .png for all images.

Parameters:

Returns:
BufferedImage generated from given hex string.
Throws:
